headline: Is It Too Late To Consider Amphenol (APH) After Its 121% One Year Surge?
summary: If you are wondering whether Amphenol’s share price still reflects fair value after a strong run, this article walks through what the current valuation actually says. The stock last closed at US$146.06, after a 3.3% decline over the past 7 days, a 0.1% return over 30 days, 4.5% year to date, 121.0% over 1 year and 278.8% over 3 years, with a very large gain over 5 years of 396.9%. Recent coverage has focused on Amphenol’s position in connectors and interconnect systems and how its exposure...
